description: Highest level of hospital cover providing comprehensive coverage across all clinical categories. Includes cover for all MBS items and hospital treatments with no exclusions or restrictions on services.

Mid-high level hospital cover providing coverage for most common hospital treatments. Covers rehabilitation, hospital psychiatric services, and palliative care with some restrictions on certain procedures.

Entry-level hospital cover providing coverage for essential hospital treatments. Covers minimum requirements including rehabilitation and hospital psychiatric services with restrictions on elective procedures.

Minimum level hospital cover designed primarily for Lifetime Health Cover and Medicare Levy Surcharge purposes. Provides limited coverage with significant restrictions and exclusions on most hospital services.
